languages.text: "А когда подыщу достойного наследника — передам ему власть, снаряжу небольшой корабль и отправлюсь куда-нибудь к Звездам Безбожников. Есть еще столько миров, которых я не видел".

"And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."
languages.original_text: "А когда подыщу достойного наследника — передам ему власть, снаряжу небольшой корабль и отправлюсь куда-нибудь к Звездам Безбожников. Есть еще столько миров, которых я не видел".

traits.locale_text: "And when I find a worthy heir, I will hand over my power to them, equip a small ship, and set off to the Heathen Stars or some such place. There are so many worlds I have not seen yet."
"And when I find a worthy heir, I will hand over my power to them, equip a small ship, and set off to the Heathen Stars or some such place. There are so many worlds I have not seen yet."

"And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

"And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

"And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

"And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

languages.text: «Y cuando por fin encuentre un digno heredero, le confiaré mi poder y partiré rumbo a las Estrellas Paganas o algún otro lugar semejante. Hay tantos mundos que todavía no he visto...».
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: «Y cuando por fin encuentre un digno heredero, le confiaré mi poder y partiré rumbo a las Estrellas Paganas o algún otro lugar semejante. Hay tantos mundos que todavía no he visto...».

languages.text: “等我找到合适的继承人之后，我会把我的权力托付给新的领袖。在这之后，我会登上一艘小船，去异端群星或别的什么地方。这个宇宙里还有很多世界我没见过。”
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: “等我找到合适的继承人之后，我会把我的权力托付给新的领袖。在这之后，我会登上一艘小船，去异端群星或别的什么地方。这个宇宙里还有很多世界我没见过。”

languages.text: « Et quand j'aurai trouvé un héritier digne de ce nom, je lui confierai tous mes pouvoirs, je me préparerai un petit vaisseau et je partirai pour les Étoiles Athées ou ailleurs. Il y a tant de mondes que je n'ai pas encore vus. »
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: « Et quand j'aurai trouvé un héritier digne de ce nom, je lui confierai tous mes pouvoirs, je me préparerai un petit vaisseau et je partirai pour les Étoiles Athées ou ailleurs. Il y a tant de mondes que je n'ai pas encore vus. »

languages.text: 「そして、立派な後継者が見つかったら、俺の力を彼らに託し、小さな船に乗り、異教に歌われし星々か、他の同じような場所へと旅立とう。まだ見ぬ世界がたくさんあるのだから」
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、立派な後継者が見つかったら、俺の力を彼らに託し、小さな船に乗り、異教に歌われし星々か、他の同じような場所へと旅立とう。まだ見ぬ世界がたくさんあるのだから」

languages.text: "Und wenn ich endlich einen würdigen Erben finde, vertraue ich ihm meine Macht an, rüste ein kleines Schiff aus und fliege zu den Sternen der Ungläubigen oder so etwas. Es gibt so viele Welten, die ich noch nicht gesehen habe."
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn ich endlich einen würdigen Erben finde, vertraue ich ihm meine Macht an, rüste ein kleines Schiff aus und fliege zu den Sternen der Ungläubigen oder so etwas. Es gibt so viele Welten, die ich noch nicht gesehen habe."

languages.text: "Nihayet göreve yaraşır bir vâris bulduğumda ona gücümü devredecek, küçük bir gemiyi donatıp Küffar Yıldızlar'a veya benzeri bir yere doğru yola koyulacağım. Henüz görmediğim bir sürü dünya var."
languages.original_text: "And when I finally find a worthy heir, I shall entrust my power to them, outfit a small ship, and set off for the Heathen Stars or some other such place. There are so many worlds I have not yet seen."

traits.locale_text: "Nihayet göreve yaraşır bir vâris bulduğumda ona gücümü vereceğim, küçük bir gemiyi donatıp Küffar Yıldızlara veya ona benzer bir yere doğru yola koyulacağım. Henüz görmediğim bir sürü dünya var."
